snippet.title: The Wonderful One: After School Hero — Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
PlatinumGames releases The Wonderful One: After School Hero standalone version! (On Nintendo Switch, PS4, Steam)
Take out bad guys in this SUPER-DUPER-FUN SIDE-SCROLLING LASER SHOOTING ACTION!

This is a standalone version of the free DLC released for the owners of The Wonderful 101: Remastered game. Jump into Arcade Mode and enjoy the story, play any Drill of your choosing in Challenge Mode, aim for a high score within 5 minutes in Caravan Mode...oh, and upload your scores to the Online Ranking! This unique, exhilarating side-scrolling shooting action is yours to enjoy, even if you are not familiar with The Wonderful 101 universe.

Note: You do not need to purchase this game if you already have a copy of The Wonderful 101: Remastered, as you are able to get the same content in the form of free DLC. The only difference between this standalone version and the free DLC is that the standalone version includes PlayStation 4 Trophies and Steam Achievements.

The Wonderful One: After School Hero
https://www.platinumgames.com/games/the-wonderful-one
For Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/the-wonderful-one-after-school-hero-switch/
For PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2522-CUSA43290_00-THEWONDERFUL1ASH
For Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2399600/The_Wonderful_One_After_School_Hero/
